alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Douglas (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 10:31AM MDT until May 30 at 11:15AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Aurora County in south central South Dakota... North central Douglas County in south central South Dakota... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 1131 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Corsica, or 19 miles north of Lake Andes, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Harrison around 1135 AM CDT. Stickney and Aurora Center around 1150 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Plankinton and White Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
